asap.faceengine.faceunit

Interface FaceUnit

  • All Superinterfaces:
    asap.realizer.planunit.KeyPositionManager, asap.motionunit.MotionUnit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AUFU, DominanceFU, FACSFU, KeyframeFaceUnit, KeyframeFacsFU, KeyframeFapsMU, KeyframeMorphFU, MorphFU, MURMLKeyframeMorphFU, PlutchikFU

    public interface FaceUnit
extends asap.motionunit.MotionUnit
    A facial animation, typically with a peak-like structure. Contains a set of keys that map to 'world' time to animation time.
    Author:
    Dennis Reidsma
